content: this center-out lap rug with a knitted-on border is based on a 19th century doily pattern originally published in the 1880s in *weldon s practical knitter* for complete notes on construction techniques and yarn and needle selection please visit the pattern s page on knitty 1 1 https //knitty com/issueff23/pattmegadahlia/pattmegadahlia php
